name: I-V-f-Y
disclosureNotes: The artist self-submitted this listing: "This project is built on original compositions and MIDI structures developed over eight years of work. I’m the creator of I-V-f-Y, a composition-first workflow where all songwriting, structure, and creative direction are entirely human-driven. AI is used strictly as an rendering instruments, voices and phonetic adaptation tool within the production process. Composition, mixing, final arrangement, and mastering are fully handled by me."
markerNotes: The artist has also provided the following references: GuitarPro example in my musician IG profile (no AI involved) https://www.instagram.com/reel/DOMPv7qEe2f/, Reaper mixing and post-production https://youtu.be/B4sftYwq3aQ,  Early idea development https://youtu.be/Jblx0F5M72A?si=QfIPfZnXoDVM8dlw, Playing an old version of “Bān Gaderung” (I-V-f-Y song) live https://youtube.com/shorts/YNwcDEwdjHU?si=3gvVVy.
